query.from: v_arrivallist a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
b_arrival a
b_receiveinspection a
b_PurchaseStockIn a
b_InventoryRecord a
v_arrivallist a LEFT JOIN v_arrivalquantitygroup c ON c.contractId = a.contractId AND c.materialId = a.materialId WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
b_inventory a WHERE SUBSTRING(a.materialId FROM 1 FOR 1)='K' AND a.deleteflag='0'
v_purchaseorderdetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag='0'

v_purchaseorderdetail a LEFT JOIN v_arrivalquantitygroup b ON b.contractId = a.contractId AND b.materialId = a.materialId LEFT JOIN b_arrival c ON c.contractId = a.contractId AND c.materialId = a.materialId AND c.deleteFlag='0' AND c.arrivalId = '#'
v_receiveinspetionList a LEFT JOIN b_purchaseorderdetail b ON b.contractId=a.contractId AND b.materialId=a.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'

v_receiveinspetionList a LEFT JOIN b_purchaseorderdetail b ON b.contractId=a.contractId AND b.materialId=a.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockindetail d ON d.arrivelId = a.arrivalId AND d.materialId = a.materialId WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_materialcheckinlist a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' and A.quantityQualified > '0'
v_purchaseStockInById a LEFT JOIN b_pricereference b ON b.materialId=a.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_purchaseStockInById a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_inspectionreturn a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
b_InspectionReturn a
v_purchaseStockInById a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_receiveinspection a LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockindetail b ON a.contractId=b.contractId AND a.materialId=b.materialId AND a.arrivalId=b.arrivelId AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_purchasestockinbyid a LEFT JOIN s_user b ON b.userId=a.keepUser AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_purchasestockinbyid a LEFT JOIN s_user b ON b.userId=a.keepUser AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND a.stockinType='010'
v_materialcheckinlist a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' and A.quantityQualified > '0'
v_purchaseorderdetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag='0'
v_stockinapplylist a LEFT JOIN s_user c ON c.userId=a.userId AND c.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
b_stockinapply a
b_arrival a LEFT JOIN b_material b ON b.materialId=a.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' LEFT JOIN s_user c ON c.userId=a.userId AND c.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0'
v_materialcheckinlist a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' and A.quantityQualified > '0'
v_arrivalfrompurchaseorder a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND replace(a.contractStorage,',','')+0 < replace(quantity,',','')+0 AND left(a.materialId,1) <>'H'
v_arrivalfrompurchaseorder a WHERE a.deleteFlag = '0' AND left(a.materialId,1) <>'H' #1

v_purchaseorderdetail a left join v_inspectionreturngroupbytype e ON e.YSId = a.YSId AND e.materialId = a.materialId left join v_arrivalquantitygroup b ON b.contractId = a.contractId AND b.materialId = a.materialId left join v_inspectionreturngroup c ON c.YSId = a.YSId AND c.materialId = a.materialId WHERE a.deleteFlag='0'
b_InventoryHistory a left join b_material b ON b.materialId = a.materialId AND b.deleteFlag='0' left join s_user c ON c.userId=a.createPerson AND b.deleteFlag='0' WHERE a.deleteFlag='0'
v_depotReturn a
v_purchaseorderdetail a LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockin_groupby_ysid_materialid b ON a.YSId=b.ysid AND a.materialId=b.materialId LEFT JOIN v_orderdetail c ON a.YSId=c.YSId

f.name: IF (REPLACE (IFNULL(e.stockinQty, 0),',', '') >= REPLACE (IFNULL(e.quantity, 0),',',''), 0,IF (REPLACE (IFNULL(a.unitQuantity, 0),',','') * REPLACE (IFNULL(e.quantity, 0),',','') - REPLACE ( IFNULL(b.quantity, 0), ',','') < 0, 0, REPLACE (IFNULL(a.manufactureQuantity, 0),',','') - REPLACE ( IFNULL(b.quantity, 0), ',','')))

query.from: ( SELECT a.YSId AS YSId, a.materialId AS materialId, b.materialName AS materialName, a.deleteFlag, a.unitQuantity, format(sum( REPLACE (a.manufactureQuantity, ',','' )),2) AS manufactureQuantity FROM b_purchaseplandetail a JOIN b_material b ON b.materialId = a.materialId AND (b.deleteFlag = '0') WHERE a.deleteFlag='0' AND A.materialId = '#' GROUP BY a.YSId ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.YSId AS YSId, a.materialId AS materialId, COUNT(a.materialId) countQty, sum( REPLACE ( ifnull(a.quantity, 0), ',', '' ) ) AS quantity FROM b_stockoutdetail a LEFT JOIN b_stockout b ON a.stockOutId = b.stockOutId AND b.deleteFlag = '0' WHERE (a.deleteFlag = '0') AND a.materialId = '#' GROUP BY b.YSId ) b ON a.materialId = b.materialId AND instr(b.ysid, LEFT(a.ysid, 8)) > 0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.YSId, a.materialId, b.materialName,a.completedQuantity, if(IFNULL(c.quantity,0)<=0,ifNULL(a.completedQuantity,0),IFNULL(c.quantity,0)) stockinQty, a.quantity FROM b_orderdetail a JOIN b_material b ON a.materialId=b.materialId LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockin_groupby_ysid_materialid c ON a.ysid=c.ysid AND a.materialId = c.materialId WHERE a.deleteFlag='0') e ON e.ysid=a.ysid WHERE A.deleteFlag = '0' AND LEFT(a.YSId,2) > 17

v_purchasestockindetail a LEFT JOIN v_purchasestockindetailgroup b ON a.YSId=b.YSId AND a.contractId=b.contractId AND a.materialId=b.materialId LEFT JOIN v_purchaseorderdetail c ON c.contractId =a.contractId AND c.materialId=a.materialId
v_requisitionforzhuangpei a
s_dic a WHERE EnableFlag='0'
v_purchasestockindetail a WHERE a.deleteFlag='0'
